mapper.select: SELECT (case when MAINTYPENAME is null then '' else MAINTYPENAME end) name, (case when SUBTYPENAME is null then '' else SUBTYPENAME end) littleName, (case when ADDRESS is null then '' else ADDRESS end) address, (case when DEADLINE is null then '' else DATE_FORMAT( DEADLINE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') end) deadTime, (case when ENDTIME is null then '' else DATE_FORMAT( ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') end) endTime, (case when DISPOSEDEPARTNAME is null then '' else DISPOSEDEPARTNAME end) department, (case when DEALTIME is null then '' else DATE_FORMAT( DEALTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') end) dealTime, (case when DISPOSEOPINION is null then '' else DISPOSEOPINION end) adv, (case when EVENTDESC is null then '' else EVENTDESC end) description, (case when EVENTSRCNAME is null then '' else EVENTSRCNAME end) eventSource, (case when NEWINSTTIME is null then '' else DATE_FORMAT( NEWINSTTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') end) newTime FROM tocgcase where RECID = #{id}
